gist.summary: Optimized the Discord announcement workflow by adding manual triggers and removing heavy diff fetching.
gist.impact: Enables manual retries for failed posts and significantly speeds up the announcement process for the team.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee adjusting a retro radio tower or broadcasting equipment, symbolizing the improved announcement pipeline. A 'manual override' switch or button is visible.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee adjusting a retro broadcasting antenna with a large red button nearby. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text: 'SIGNAL BOOST'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
